item.description:
$150 gets you 20,000chips (because that's the way the vote went), and you can hang out for as long as you like. I'm simulating the blind structures of the World Series. Plenty of chips, 20 minute rounds, and a steady blind structure.

If you have won any previous tournament double check to find out if you have a voucher in your name. You might be able to buy into this tournament for as little as $10.

Got Questions: 617.947.1766. ask for Jay.

There is no voucher for this game, you win first place and you win as much as 50% of the prize pool. If you'd like to see how payouts work check the message board posting.

Tournament Blind Structure: 20 min rounds

Levels Small Blind Big Blind Ante
1st 25 50
2nd 50 100
3rd 75 150
4th 100 200 25
5th 150 300 25
6th 300 600 25
7th 400 800 50
8th 600 1200 100
9th 800 1600 100
10th 1000 2000 200
11th 2000 4000 300
12th 4000 8000 400
13th 6000 12000 500
14th 8000 16000 500
15th 10000 20000 1000
16th 15000 30000 2000
17th 20000 40000 3000
18th 40000 80000 4000
19th 60000 120000 5000
20th 80000 160000 5000
21st 100000 200000 100000


For more information, see http://poker.meetup.c...

group.name: Boston's Home Poker Game (ye' ol' BPC)

item.name: $150 gets you 20,000 in chips
